entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 02:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: 43 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending this evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the evening. Wind becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
